title: Ethan Klein Welcomes His Newborn Son “Sunny” Into The World
author: PajamaJohn
content:
Los Angeles – H3 Show host Ethan Klein welcomed his son “Sunny” during break on Wednesday, April 3rd 2024. 

Sunny was born right after the final episode before break. Ethan's Wife and Cohost Hila Klein was supposed to be induced to give birth that same Wednesday, but the couple decided to wait until the baby came on its own.

“That night, right when I got home after the show on Wednesday, Hila is going into labor. I get home and we immediately go to the hospital. And baby Sunny is born 3 hours after we left the door.” said Ethan

Sunny has been a happy and healthy baby.

“He’s happy, he’s beautiful, he’s been wonderful. The first week he was super chill, quiet.” said Ethan.
